actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: A bill to provide that the effectiveness requirements of the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act shall not apply to laetrile in certain cases.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to exempt the use of laetrile for the treatment of pain under the direction of a physician from the effectiveness requirements of such Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the effectiveness requirements of the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act shall not apply to laetrile in certain cases.
